handwerk.name: Crafts
handwerk.description: Crafts are the backbone of the region. From carpentry to auto workshops to electricians - the demand for qualified professionals is high.
handwerk.outlook: Very good prospects due to skilled worker shortage. Many companies urgently seeking new talent.
handwerk.localInfo: Rotenburg district has over 2,000 craft businesses with more than 15,000 employees.

pflege_gesundheit.name: Healthcare
pflege_gesundheit.description: The healthcare sector is growing steadily. Hospitals, nursing homes, and outpatient services are constantly seeking qualified personnel.
pflege_gesundheit.outlook: Long-term secure industry with growing demand due to demographic change.
pflege_gesundheit.localInfo: AGAPLESION Diakonieklinikum Rotenburg and numerous care facilities offer many jobs.

gastro_hotel.name: Gastronomy & Hotel
gastro_hotel.description: Restaurants, hotels, and catering companies offer diverse entry opportunities - even without formal training.
requirements: Training or experience depending on position
gastro_hotel.outlook: High demand, especially in summer season. Many businesses offer opportunities for career changers.
gastro_hotel.localInfo: The gastronomy in Zeven and surroundings benefits from tourists and local customers.

einzelhandel.name: Retail
einzelhandel.description: Local retail remains an important employer. Supermarkets, specialty stores, and hardware stores regularly seek employees.
einzelhandel.outlook: Stable demand, especially for part-time workers and mini-jobbers.
einzelhandel.localInfo: The commercial area in Zeven offers numerous shopping opportunities and thus jobs.

logistik_transport.name: Logistics & Transport
logistik_transport.description: The central location between Hamburg and Bremen makes the region a logistics hub with growing importance.
logistik_transport.outlook: Growing industry with good demand for drivers and warehouse personnel.
logistik_transport.localInfo: Several freight forwarding and logistics companies are located in the region.

industrie_produktion.name: Industry & Production
industrie_produktion.description: Manufacturing companies in the region offer secure jobs with good pay.
industrie_produktion.outlook: Solid prospects with automation trend requiring new qualifications.
industrie_produktion.localInfo: Several medium-sized manufacturing companies offer jobs in the region.

buero_verwaltung.name: Office & Administration
buero_verwaltung.description: Commercial professions in administration, accounting, and organization are in demand.
buero_verwaltung.outlook: Stable demand with increasing digitalization of work processes.
buero_verwaltung.localInfo: The district administration in Rotenburg and local companies offer diverse office jobs.

it_technik.name: IT & Technology
it_technik.description: Even in rural regions, the demand for IT professionals is growing continuously.
it_technik.outlook: Very good future prospects with increasing demand across all industries.
it_technik.localInfo: Remote work also enables jobs with employers outside the region.

bau_architektur.name: Construction & Architecture
bau_architektur.description: The construction industry is booming - both new construction and renovations are in high demand.
bau_architektur.outlook: Continuing high demand due to new construction and energy-efficient renovations.
bau_architektur.localInfo: Many local construction companies are permanently seeking skilled workers.

landwirtschaft.name: Agriculture

landwirtschaft.outlook: Stable industry with modernization and specialization.
landwirtschaft.localInfo: Rotenburg district is strongly characterized by agriculture.

frustration.title: JobNachbar was born out of frustration.
frustration.p1: Frustration that job seekers in Zeven and the surrounding area get lost on the big job portals. Hundreds of positions from Hamburg, but hardly any from your own region.
frustration.p2: And frustration that small businesses here in Rotenburg district place expensive ads – and still can't find suitable applicants.

change.title: We wanted to change that.
change.text: In 2026, we founded JobNachbar. With a simple mission:
change.mission: Connecting people and businesses in our region.

whyName.title: Why "JobNachbar"?
whyName.p1: Because the best job is often closer than you think. At the neighbor's around the corner. At the business you drive by every day.
whyName.p2: We believe that work is more than earning money. It's about short commutes, community, and strengthening our region.

faqPage.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about JobNachbar
faqPage.contactMessage: We're happy to help. Contact us or use the feedback button.

free.question: Is JobNachbar free?
free.answer: Yes, the basic version is completely free for applicants. You can register, search for jobs and apply without paying a cent. For advanced features like unlimited AI tools, there's JobNachbar Premium.

region.question: Which region does JobNachbar cover?
region.answer: We focus on Zeven and a 30km radius. This includes Rotenburg (Wümme), Bremervörde, Sittensen, Tarmstedt, Scheeßel and many other places.

howApply.question: How do I apply for a job?
howApply.answer: Click on a job, then click 'Apply Now'. You can upload your resume and add a cover letter. The employer receives your application directly.

uploadCv.question: Can I upload my resume?
uploadCv.answer: Yes! Go to your dashboard under 'Profile' and upload your resume as PDF. It will then be sent automatically with every application.

premium.question: What is JobNachbar Premium?
premium.answer: With Premium (€4.99/month) you get unlimited access to our AI tools: Resume Generator, Cover Letter Generator, Interview Coach and more.

notifications.question: How do I find out about new matching jobs?
notifications.answer: Enable email notifications in your profile. We'll then automatically send you new jobs that match your preferences.

dataSafe.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafe.answer: Yes. We store your data GDPR-compliant in Germany. Your profile is only visible to employers you apply to.

cost.question: What does a job posting cost?
cost.answer: We offer various packages - starting from €29 per month. You can find all details on our pricing page.

duration.question: How long does my listing run?
duration.answer: Depending on the package, 30, 60 or 90 days. You can extend or pause it at any time.

multipleJobs.question: Can I post multiple jobs at once?
multipleJobs.answer: Yes, with our Starter and Professional packages you can have multiple positions online simultaneously.

receiveApplications.question: How do applications reach me?
receiveApplications.answer: You'll receive an email notification and can manage and respond to all applications in your dashboard.

whoIsBehind.question: Who is behind JobNachbar?
whoIsBehind.answer: JobNachbar was founded in 2026. Learn more on our 'About Us' page.

feedback.question: I found a bug / have an idea
feedback.answer: Great! Use the feedback button on any page or contact us via the contact form.

deleteAccount.question: How can I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer: Send us a short email to info@jobnachbar.com and we'll delete all your data within 48 hours.

mobileApp.question: Is there an app for JobNachbar?
mobileApp.answer: JobNachbar is optimized as a Progressive Web App (PWA). You can add the website to your phone's home screen and use it like an app - no app store download needed.

scope.title: §1 Scope
scope.content: These Terms of Service apply to all contracts between JobNachbar and users of the platform. Deviating conditions of the user are not recognized unless JobNachbar expressly agrees to their validity in writing.

services.title: §2 Service Description
services.content: JobNachbar operates an online job board for the Zeven region and surrounding areas. Job seekers can create a profile for free and apply for positions. Employers can publish job advertisements and contact applicants.

registration.title: §3 Registration and User Accounts
registration.content: Registration is required to use certain features. The user is obligated to provide truthful information and keep their access data confidential. JobNachbar may suspend the account if misuse is suspected.

pricing.title: §4 Prices and Payment Terms
pricing.content: Usage for job seekers is free. For employers, the rates listed on the pricing page apply. All prices include statutory VAT. Invoices are payable within 14 days of the invoice date.

contract.title: §5 Contract Term and Termination
contract.content: Subscriptions renew automatically for the booked period unless cancelled before expiration. Cancellation is possible at any time at the end of the billing period. Free accounts can be deleted at any time.

liability.title: §6 Liability
liability.content: JobNachbar is only liable for damages caused by intentional or grossly negligent conduct. JobNachbar does not guarantee the accuracy of content posted by users. Liability for indirect damages is excluded.

dataProtection.title: §7 Data Protection
dataProtection.content: The processing of personal data is carried out in accordance with our privacy policy and applicable data protection laws. By using the platform, the user agrees to the processing of their data for the purposes stated in the privacy policy.

final.title: §8 Final Provisions
final.content: German law applies. The place of jurisdiction is, as far as legally permissible, the registered office of JobNachbar. Should individual provisions be invalid, the validity of the remaining provisions remains unaffected. As of: January 2026
